typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Date;NewPositive;NotPrevPos;PosPct;PrevPos;Tested;Tested_kumulativ} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Select1 filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		{Date;NewPositive;NotPrevPos;PosPct;PrevPos;Tested;Tested_kumulativ}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Filter1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
